rows.label: qst104706_msg001
rows.name:
男達は救助を求めにイヤサキ港に行ったけど
一向に戻ってこないの――
様子を見に行ってきてもらえないかしら？(仮)

rows.label: qst104706_msg101
rows.name: 男達を助けてくれてありがとう(仮)

rows.label: qst104706_msg0001
rows.name:
That was a close shave.
Thank you for your assistance.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0002
rows.name: Why did you decide to fight alone?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0003
rows.name:
Without a Driver, you mean?
It was rather reckless of me.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0004
rows.name:
Tell me, Byakko. Do you never
wish that your form was something
closer to human?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0005
rows.name: What do you mean, ma'am?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0006
rows.name:
If you were shaped like a human,
you could hold a weapon.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0007
rows.name:
You could provide first aid
to injured people.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0008
rows.name:
Not being able to use tools of any
kind... It frustrates me, Byakko.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0009
rows.name: You have a kind soul, Enju.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0010
rows.name:
I had not considered
such things before.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0101
rows.name: How should I follow up?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0102
rows.name: We can let people ride on our backs

rows.label: qst104706_msg0103
rows.name: We can comfort people

rows.label: qst104706_msg0201
rows.name:
Well, the advantage of this form is that
we can let people ride on our backs.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0202
rows.name:
My Driver is awfully big. I wonder
if I'd be able to carry him...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0203
rows.name:
My Driver Nia always says that
galloping along with the wind in her
face makes her feel truly alive.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0204
rows.name:
Besides, we are much stronger
than humans! A heavy load is
no burden for us.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0205
rows.name: Oi, who you calling heavy?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0206
rows.name:
Ah, no-
I did not mean to imply that you
were heavy, my lady.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0301
rows.name:
You know, one of the advantages of
a form like ours is that we can
provide great comfort to people.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0302
rows.name:
If I was shaped like a human male, and
Nia found my appearance distasteful,
we couldn't be as close as we are now.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0303
rows.name: That is true...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0304
rows.name:
If I were a human woman, Oswalt
wouldn't be able to brush my fur as he
does now. Women make him nervous.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0401
rows.name:
Thank you, Byakko, for
helping me see that this
form isn't so bad after all.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0402
rows.name: I'm happy I could be of assistance.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0403
rows.name: Will you return to the ship?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0404
rows.name: You have injured people to tend to.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0405
rows.name:
We will pass word of your safety
to your Driver in Ysheva Harbor.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0406
rows.name: Um, Byakko?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0407
rows.name:
Thank you.
You have been most kind.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0408
rows.name:
I will see you later at the Torigo
Relay Base...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0409
rows.name:
No, actually, would you be so
kind as to meet me directly at
the Superbia Consulate?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0410
rows.name: Of course, ma'am.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0411
rows.name: Then farewell for now.
